channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-2203|2024-08-04T07:01:41.158Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20fortify%20on%20demand%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Fortify on Demand Plugin 5.0.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to the globally configured Fortify on Demand endpoint using attacker-specified credentials IDs.

item.title: CVE-2020-2319|2024-08-04T07:09:54.620Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20vmware%20lab%20manager%20slaves%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins VMware Lab Manager Slaves Plugin 0.2.8 and earlier stores a password unencrypted in the global config.xml file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2101|2024-08-04T07:01:39.702Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.218 and earlier, LTS 2.204.1 and earlier did not use a constant-time comparison function for validating connection secrets, which could potentially allow an attacker to use a timing attack to obtain this secret.

item.title: CVE-2020-2314|2024-08-04T07:09:54.158Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20appspider%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AppSpider Plugin 1.0.12 and earlier stores a password unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2171|2024-08-04T07:01:40.667Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rapiddeploy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins RapidDeploy Plugin 4.2 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2020-2307|2024-08-04T07:09:53.317Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20kubernetes%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Kubernetes Plugin 1.27.3 and earlier allows low-privilege users to access possibly sensitive Jenkins controller environment variables.

item.title: CVE-2020-2177|2024-08-04T07:01:41.116Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20copr%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Copr Plugin 0.3 and earlier stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2228|2024-08-04T07:01:41.088Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitlab%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Gitlab Authentication Plugin 1.5 and earlier does not perform group authorization checks properly, resulting in a privilege escalation vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2110|2024-08-04T07:01:39.727Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: Sandbox protection in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1.69 and earlier could be circumvented during the script compilation phase by applying AST transforming annotations to imports or by using them inside of other annotations.

item.title: CVE-2020-2168|2024-08-04T07:01:41.108Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20azure%20container%20service%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Azure Container Service Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier does not configure its YAML parser to prevent the instantiation of arbitrary types, resulting in a remote code execution vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2219|2024-08-04T07:01:41.123Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20link%20column%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Link Column Plugin 1.0 and earlier does not filter URLs of links created by users with View/Configure permission, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2210|2024-08-04T07:01:41.190Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20stash%20branch%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Stash Branch Parameter Plugin 0.3.0 and earlier transmits configured passwords in plain text as part of its global Jenkins configuration form, potentially resulting in their exposure.

item.title: CVE-2020-2152|2024-08-04T07:01:40.874Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Release Manager Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not escape the error message for the Repository URL field form validation, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2303|2024-08-04T07:09:53.359Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20active%20directory%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Active Directory Plugin 2.19 and earlier allows attackers to perform connection tests, connecting to attacker-specified or previously configured Active Directory servers using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2020-2158|2024-08-04T07:01:41.206Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20literate%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Literate Plugin 1.0 and earlier does not configure its YAML parser to prevent the instantiation of arbitrary types, resulting in a remote code execution vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2260|2024-08-04T07:01:41.195Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20perfecto%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Perfecto Plugin 1.17 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2020-2097|2024-08-04T06:54:00.613Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sounds%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Sounds Plugin 0.5 and earlier does not perform permission checks in URLs performing form validation, allowing attackers with Overall/Read access to execute arbitrary OS commands as the OS user account running Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2020-2239|2024-08-04T07:01:41.273Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20parameterized%20remote%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Parameterized Remote Trigger Plugin 3.1.3 and earlier stores a secret unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by attackers with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2116|2024-08-04T07:01:39.734Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20github%20notify%20step%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Pipeline GitHub Notify Step Plugin 1.0.4 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2020-2238|2024-08-04T07:01:41.300Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git Parameter Plugin 0.9.12 and earlier does not escape the repository field on the 'Build with Parameters' page, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2232|2024-08-04T07:01:41.190Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20email%20extension%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Email Extension Plugin 2.72 and 2.73 transmits and displays the SMTP password in plain text as part of the global Jenkins configuration form, potentially resulting in its exposure.

item.title: CVE-2020-2270|2024-08-04T07:01:41.305Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20clearcase%20release%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins ClearCase Release Plugin 0.3 and earlier does not escape the composite baseline in badge tooltip, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2192|2024-08-04T07:01:40.974Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20self-organizing%20swarm%20plug-in%20modules%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Self-Organizing Swarm Plug-in Modules Plugin 3.20 and earlier allows attackers to add or remove agent labels.

item.title: CVE-2020-2293|2024-08-04T07:01:41.212Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20persona%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Persona Plugin 2.4 and earlier allows users with Overall/Read permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller.

item.title: CVE-2020-2287|2024-08-04T07:01:41.267Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20audit%20trail%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Audit Trail Plugin 3.6 and earlier applies pattern matching to a different representation of request URL paths than the Stapler web framework uses for dispatching requests, which allows attackers to craft URLs that bypass request logging of any target URL.

item.title: CVE-2020-2242|2024-08-04T07:01:41.169Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20database%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins database Plugin 1.6 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read access to Jenkins to connect to an attacker-specified database server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2020-2184|2024-08-04T07:01:40.935Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cvs%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins CVS Plugin 2.15 and earlier allows attackers to create and manipulate tags, and to connect to an attacker-specified URL.

item.title: CVE-2020-2204|2024-08-04T07:01:41.183Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20fortify%20on%20demand%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Fortify on Demand Plugin 5.0.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to the globally configured Fortify on Demand endpoint using attacker-specified credentials IDs.

item.title: CVE-2020-2252|2024-08-04T07:01:41.144Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mailer%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Mailer Plugin 1.32 and earlier does not perform hostname validation when connecting to the configured SMTP server.

item.title: CVE-2020-2275|2024-08-04T07:01:41.348Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20copy%20data%20to%20workspace%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Copy data to workspace Plugin 1.0 and earlier does not limit which directories can be copied from the Jenkins controller to job workspaces, allowing attackers with Job/Configure permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller.

item.title: CVE-2020-2224|2024-08-04T07:01:41.171Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20matrix%20project%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Matrix Project Plugin 1.16 and earlier does not escape the node names shown in tooltips on the overview page of builds with a single axis, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2140|2024-08-04T07:01:41.050Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20audit%20trail%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Audit Trail Plugin 3.2 and earlier does not escape the error message for the URL Patterns field form validation, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2286|2024-08-04T07:01:41.187Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20role-based%20authorization%20strategy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Role-based Authorization Strategy Plugin 3.0 and earlier does not properly invalidate a permission cache when the configuration is changed, resulting in permissions being granted based on an outdated configuration.

item.title: CVE-2020-2229|2024-08-04T07:01:41.164Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.251 and earlier, LTS 2.235.3 and earlier does not escape the tooltip content of help icons, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2138|2024-08-04T07:01:40.836Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cobertura%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Cobertura Plugin 1.15 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2020-2257|2024-08-04T07:01:41.167Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20validating%20string%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Validating String Parameter Plugin 2.4 and earlier does not escape various user-controlled fields, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2247|2024-08-04T07:01:41.186Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20klocwork%20analysis%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Klocwork Analysis Plugin 2020.2.1 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2020-2235|2024-08-04T07:01:41.114Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20maven%20integration%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Pipeline Maven Integration Plugin 3.8.2 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified JDBC URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, potentially capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2020-2285|2024-08-04T07:01:41.284Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20liquibase%20runner%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Liquibase Runner Plugin 1.4.7 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2020-2154|2024-08-04T07:01:40.703Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20zephyr%20for%20jira%20test%20management%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Zephyr for JIRA Test Management Plugin 1.5 and earlier stores its credentials in plain text in a global configuration file on the Jenkins master file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2266|2024-08-04T07:01:41.170Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20description%20column%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Description Column Plugin 1.3 and earlier does not escape the job description in the column tooltip, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2205|2024-08-04T07:01:41.048Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20vncrecorder%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins VncRecorder Plugin 1.25 and earlier does not escape a tool path in the `checkVncServ` form validation endpoint, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by Jenkins administrators.

item.title: CVE-2020-2125|2024-08-04T07:01:40.700Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20debian%20package%20builder%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Debian Package Builder Plugin 1.6.11 and earlier stores a GPG passphrase unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where it can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2112|2024-08-04T07:01:40.443Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git Parameter Plugin 0.9.11 and earlier does not escape the parameter name shown on the UI, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exploitable by users with Job/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2311|2024-08-04T07:09:53.309Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20aws%20global%20configuration%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins AWS Global Configuration Plugin 1.5 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to replace the global AWS configuration.

item.title: CVE-2020-2268|2024-08-04T07:01:41.176Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mongodb%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins MongoDB Plugin 1.3 and earlier allows attackers to gain access to some metadata of any arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller.

item.title: CVE-2020-2174|2024-08-04T07:01:41.282Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20awseb%20deployment%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AWSEB Deployment Plugin 0.3.19 and earlier does not escape various values printed as part of form validation output, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2166|2024-08-04T07:01:40.876Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20aws%20steps%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: AWS Steps Plugin 1.40 and earlier does not configure its YAML parser to prevent the instantiation of arbitrary types, resulting in a remote code execution vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2283|2024-08-04T07:01:41.417Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20liquibase%20runner%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Liquibase Runner Plugin 1.4.5 and earlier does not escape changeset contents, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by users able to control changeset files evaluated by the plugin.

item.title: CVE-2020-2113|2024-08-04T07:01:40.866Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git Parameter Plugin 0.9.11 and earlier does not escape the default value shown on the UI, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exploitable by users with Job/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2236|2024-08-04T07:01:41.283Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20yet%20another%20build%20visualizer%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Yet Another Build Visualizer Plugin 1.11 and earlier does not escape tooltip content, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by users with Run/Update permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2180|2024-08-04T07:01:41.022Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20aws%20sam%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AWS SAM Plugin 1.2.2 and earlier does not configure its YAML parser to prevent the instantiation of arbitrary types, resulting in a remote code execution vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2150|2024-08-04T07:01:40.842Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sonar%20quality%20gates%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Sonar Quality Gates Plugin 1.3.1 and earlier transmits configured credentials in plain text as part of its global Jenkins configuration form, potentially resulting in their exposure.

item.title: CVE-2020-2199|2024-08-04T07:01:41.151Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier does not escape the error message for the repository URL field form validation, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2321|2024-08-04T07:09:54.337Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20shelve%20project%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Shelve Project Plugin 3.0 and earlier allows attackers to shelve, unshelve, or delete a project.

item.title: CVE-2020-2221|2024-08-04T07:01:41.082Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.244 and earlier, LTS 2.235.1 and earlier does not escape the upstream job's display name shown as part of a build cause, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2129|2024-08-04T07:01:40.874Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20eagle%20tester%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Eagle Tester Plugin 1.0.9 and earlier stores a password unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where it can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2206|2024-08-04T07:01:41.180Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20vncrecorder%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins VncRecorder Plugin 1.25 and earlier does not escape a parameter value in the checkVncServ form validation endpoint, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2276|2024-08-04T07:01:41.444Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20selection%20tasks%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Selection tasks Plugin 1.0 and earlier executes a user-specified program on the Jenkins controller, allowing attackers with Job/Configure permission to execute an arbitrary system command on the Jenkins controller as the OS user that the Jenkins process is running as.

item.title: CVE-2020-2187|2024-08-04T07:01:40.945Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20amazon%20ec2%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Amazon EC2 Plugin 1.50.1 and earlier unconditionally accepts self-signed certificates and does not perform hostname validation, enabling man-in-the-middle attacks.

item.title: CVE-2020-2093|2024-08-04T06:54:00.882Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20health%20advisor%20by%20cloudbees%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Health Advisor by CloudBees Plugin 3.0 and earlier allows attackers to send an email with fixed content to an attacker-specified recipient.

item.title: CVE-2020-2217|2024-08-04T07:01:41.244Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20compatibility%20action%20storage%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Compatibility Action Storage Plugin 1.0 and earlier does not escape the content coming from the MongoDB in the testConnection form validation endpoint, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2186|2024-08-04T07:01:40.963Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20amazon%20ec2%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Amazon EC2 Plugin 1.50.1 and earlier allows attackers to provision instances.

item.title: CVE-2020-2109|2024-08-04T07:01:39.732Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20groovy%20plugin
item.description: Sandbox protection in Jenkins Pipeline: Groovy Plugin 2.78 and earlier can be circumvented through default parameter expressions in CPS-transformed methods.

item.title: CVE-2020-2170|2024-08-04T07:01:40.875Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rapiddeploy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins RapidDeploy Plugin 4.2 and earlier does not escape package names in the table of packages obtained from a remote server, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2264|2024-08-04T07:01:41.387Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20custom%20job%20icon%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Custom Job Icon Plugin 0.2 and earlier does not escape the job descriptions in tooltips, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2165|2024-08-04T07:01:40.975Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20artifactory%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Artifactory Plugin 3.6.0 and earlier transmits configured passwords in plain text as part of its global Jenkins configuration form, potentially resulting in their exposure.

item.title: CVE-2020-2214|2024-08-04T07:01:41.063Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20zap%20pipeline%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins ZAP Pipeline Plugin 1.9 and earlier programmatically disables Content-Security-Policy protection for user-generated content in workspaces, archived artifacts, etc. that Jenkins offers for download.

item.title: CVE-2020-2153|2024-08-04T07:01:40.686Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20backlog%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Backlog Plugin 2.4 and earlier transmits configured credentials in plain text as part of job configuration forms, potentially resulting in their exposure.

item.title: CVE-2020-2178|2024-08-04T07:01:40.974Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20parasoft%20findings%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Parasoft Findings Plugin 10.4.3 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2020-2261|2024-08-04T07:01:41.175Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20perfecto%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Perfecto Plugin 1.17 and earlier executes a command on the Jenkins controller, allowing attackers with Job/Configure permission to run arbitrary commands on the Jenkins controller

item.title: CVE-2020-2198|2024-08-04T07:01:41.160Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20project%20inheritance%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Project Inheritance Plugin 19.08.02 and earlier does not redact encrypted secrets in the 'getConfigAsXML' API URL when transmitting job config.xml data to users without Job/Configure.

item.title: CVE-2020-2124|2024-08-04T07:01:41.051Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dynamic%20extended%20choice%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Dynamic Extended Choice Parameter Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier stores a password unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where it can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2183|2024-08-04T07:01:41.061Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20copy%20artifact%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Copy Artifact Plugin 1.43.1 and earlier performs improper permission checks, allowing attackers to copy artifacts from jobs they have no permission to access.

item.title: CVE-2020-2225|2024-08-04T07:01:41.253Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20matrix%20project%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Matrix Project Plugin 1.16 and earlier does not escape the axis names shown in tooltips on the overview page of builds with multiple axes, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2099|2024-08-04T07:01:39.729Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.213 and earlier, LTS 2.204.1 and earlier improperly reuses encryption key parameters in the Inbound TCP Agent Protocol/3, allowing unauthorized attackers with knowledge of agent names to obtain the connection secrets for those agents, which can be used to connect to Jenkins, impersonating those agents.

item.title: CVE-2020-2139|2024-08-04T07:01:41.043Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cobertura%20plugin
item.description: An arbitrary file write vulnerability in Jenkins Cobertura Plugin 1.15 and earlier allows attackers able to control the coverage report file contents to overwrite any file on the Jenkins master file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2289|2024-08-04T07:01:41.291Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20active%20choices%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Active Choices Plugin 2.4 and earlier does not escape the name and description of build parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2145|2024-08-04T07:01:41.239Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20zephyr%20enterprise%20test%20management%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Zephyr Enterprise Test Management Plugin 1.9.1 and earlier stores its Zephyr password in plain text on the Jenkins master file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2231|2024-08-04T07:01:41.196Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.251 and earlier, LTS 2.235.3 and earlier does not escape the remote address of the host starting a build via 'Trigger builds remotely', resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by users with Job/Configure permission or knowledge of the Authentication Token.

item.title: CVE-2020-2190|2024-08-04T07:01:41.240Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1.72 and earlier does not correctly escape pending or approved classpath entries on the In-process Script Approval page, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2159|2024-08-04T07:01:40.936Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cryptomove%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins CryptoMove Plugin 0.1.33 and earlier allows attackers with Job/Configure access to execute arbitrary OS commands on the Jenkins master as the OS user account running Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2020-2163|2024-08-04T07:01:40.841Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.227 and earlier, LTS 2.204.5 and earlier improperly processes HTML content of list view column headers, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability exploitable by users able to control column headers.

item.title: CVE-2020-2131|2024-08-04T07:01:40.876Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20harvest%20scm%20plugin

item.description: Jenkins Storable Configs Plugin 1.0 and earlier allows users with Job/Read permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller.

item.description: Jenkins 2.227 and earlier, LTS 2.204.5 and earlier does not set Content-Security-Policy headers for files uploaded as file parameters to a build, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-2103|2024-08-04T07:01:39.590Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins

item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers to trigger a build.

item.description: Jenkins GitBucket Plugin 0.8 and earlier does not sanitize Gitbucket URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-28155|2024-08-02T00:48:49.350Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20appspider%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AppSpider Plugin 1.0.16 and earlier does not perform permission checks in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to obtain information about available scan config names, engine group names, and client names.

item.title: CVE-2024-28156|2024-08-02T00:48:49.459Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20monitor%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Build Monitor View Plugin 1.14-860.vd06ef2568b_3f and earlier does not escape Build Monitor View names, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure Build Monitor Views.

item.title: CVE-2024-28162|2024-08-02T00:48:49.411Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1 through 3.1.0 (both inclusive) a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections fails to take effect until Jenkins is restarted when switching from disabled validation to enabled validation.

item.title: CVE-2024-2216|2024-08-01T19:03:39.393Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in an HTTP endpoint in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-2215|2024-08-01T19:03:39.139Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-28157|2024-07-23T15:53:18.459Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitbucket%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitBucket Plugin 0.8 and earlier does not sanitize Gitbucket URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-07-05T17:22:42.883Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-06-26T18:32:51.005Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-28157|2024-03-06T17:01:59.358Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitbucket%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitBucket Plugin 0.8 and earlier does not sanitize Gitbucket URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-28161|2024-06-04T18:04:02.925Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1, a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections is disabled by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-28160|2024-06-04T18:03:57.423Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20icescrum%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins iceScrum Plugin 1.1.6 and earlier does not sanitize iceScrum project URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-28156|2024-06-04T18:03:53.240Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20monitor%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Build Monitor View Plugin 1.14-860.vd06ef2568b_3f and earlier does not escape Build Monitor View names, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure Build Monitor Views.

item.title: CVE-2024-28151|2024-06-04T18:03:47.410Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier archives invalid symbolic links in report directories on agents and recreates them on the controller, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists, without being able to access it.

item.title: CVE-2024-28150|2024-06-04T18:03:41.778Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier does not escape job names, report names, and index page titles shown as part of the report frame, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-28149|2024-06-04T18:03:30.882Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.16 through 1.32 (both inclusive) does not properly sanitize input, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to implement cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists.

item.title: CVE-2024-28153|2024-06-04T18:03:26.345Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20owasp%20dependency-check%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin 5.4.5 and earlier does not escape vulnerability metadata from Dependency-Check reports, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28152|2024-03-06T17:01:56.184Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 866.vdea_7dcd3008e and earlier, except 848.850.v6a_a_2a_234a_c81, when discovering pull requests from forks, the trust policy "Forks in the same account" allows changes to Jenkinsfiles from users without write access to the project when using Bitbucket Server.

item.title: CVE-2024-28155|2024-06-04T18:03:13.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20appspider%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AppSpider Plugin 1.0.16 and earlier does not perform permission checks in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to obtain information about available scan config names, engine group names, and client names.

item.title: CVE-2024-28159|2024-03-06T17:02:00.731Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Read permission to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2024-28158|2024-03-06T17:01:59.995Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers to trigger a build.

item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1 through 3.1.0 (both inclusive) a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections fails to take effect until Jenkins is restarted when switching from disabled validation to enabled validation.

item.title: CVE-2024-28154|2024-06-04T18:03:06.484Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mq%20notifier%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins MQ Notifier Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier logs potentially sensitive build parameters as part of debug information in build logs by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-5273|2024-05-24T13:46:09.897Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20report%20info%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Report Info Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not perform path validation of the workspace directory while serving report files, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to retrieve Surefire failures, PMD violations, Findbugs bugs, and Checkstyle errors on the controller file system by editing the workspace path.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-06-06T18:23:11.386Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34148|2024-06-04T17:42:07.420Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier programmatically disables the fix for CVE-2016-3721 whenever a build is triggered from a release tag, by setting the Java system property 'hudson.model.ParametersAction.keepUndefinedParameters'.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-06-06T18:23:32.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34146|2024-06-04T17:41:47.091Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git server Plugin 114.v068a_c7cc2574 and earlier does not perform a permission check for read access to a Git repository over SSH, allowing attackers with a previously configured SSH public key but lacking Overall/Read permission to access these repositories.

item.description: Jenkins Telegram Bot Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier stores the Telegram Bot token unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.
